verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. YY <WH3068>, remember <WH2142> <WH8798> David <WH1732>, and all his afflictions <WH6031> <WH8793>:
How he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto the YY <WH3068>, and vowed <WH5087> <WH8804> unto the mighty <WH46> 'Elohim of Ya`akov <WH3290>;
Surely I will not come <WH935> <WH8799> into the tabernacle <WH168> of my house <WH1004>, nor go up <WH5927> <WH8799> into my bed <WH6210> <WH3326>;
I will not give <WH5414> <WH8799> sleep <WH8153> to mine eyes <WH5869>, or slumber <WH8572> to mine eyelids <WH6079>,
Until I find out <WH4672> <WH8799> a place <WH4725> for the YY <WH3068>, an habitation <WH4908> for the mighty <WH46> 'Elohim of Ya`akov <WH3290>.
Lo, we heard <WH8085> <WH8804> of it at Ephratah <WH672>: we found <WH4672> <WH8804> it in the fields <WH7704> of the wood <WH3293>.
We will go <WH935> <WH8799> into his tabernacles <WH4908>: we will worship <WH7812> <WH8691> at his footstool <WH1916> <WH7272>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, into thy rest <WH4496>; thou, and the ark <WH727> of thy strength <WH5797>.
Let thy Kohanim <WH3548> be clothed <WH3847> <WH8799> with righteousness <WH6664>; and let thy saints <WH2623> shout for joy <WH7442> <WH8762>.
For thy servant <WH5650> David's <WH1732> sake turn not away <WH7725> <WH8686> the face <WH6440> of thine anointed <WH4899>.

The YY <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> in truth <WH571> unto David <WH1732>; he will not turn <WH7725> <WH8799> from it; Of the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990> will I set <WH7896> <WH8799> upon thy throne <WH3678>.

If thy children <WH1121> will keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my covenant <WH1285> and my testimony <WH5713> that <WH2090> <WH8675> <WH2097> I shall teach <WH3925> <WH8762> them, their children <WH1121> shall also sit <WH3427> <WH8799> upon thy throne <WH3678> for evermore <WH5703>.
For the YY <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977> <WH8804> TZiyon <WH6726>; he hath desired <WH183> <WH8765> it for his habitation <WH4186>.
This is my rest <WH4496> for ever <WH5703>: here will I dwell <WH3427> <WH8799>; for I have desired <WH183> <WH8765> it.
I will abundantly <WH1288> <WH8763> bless <WH1288> <WH8762> her provision <WH6718>: I will satisfy <WH7646> <WH8686> her poor <WH34> with bread <WH3899>.
I will also clothe <WH3847> <WH8686> her Kohanim <WH3548> with salvation <WH3468>: and her saints <WH2623> shall shout aloud <WH7442> <WH8762> for joy <WH7444> <WH8763>.
There will I make <WH6779> the shofar <WH7161> of David <WH1732> to bud <WH6779> <WH8686>: I have ordained <WH6186> <WH8804> a Menorah <WH5216> for mine anointed <WH4899>.
His enemies <WH341> <WH8802> will I clothe <WH3847> <WH8686> with shame <WH1322>: but upon himself shall his crown <WH5145> flourish <WH6692> <WH8686>.
